pullRequest.title: [WFLY-13991]: Artemis should not delete corrupt log files.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adding attribute max-attic-files on the journal definition.

Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-13991
Proposal: wildfly/wildfly-proposals#347
Should be rebased on #13906 when it is merged

nodes.bodyText:
Can you please parametrize this hard-coded path? Maybe that something like this could help:
            File target = new File(System.getProperty("jboss.home"), "standalone/data/activemq/journal/attic/");

Now we have two test methods. First call of this method (and the following start in the following setup method) seems to be useless. Can you call this container.stop after all test methods are executed (and not after each test method)? Maybe that ServerSetupTask could help (like in this example)?
Can you please add some general javadoc here? Or add javadoc to each testmethod? So far just one test method has javadoc
